review_title: Extremely fulfilling place to grow professionally
pros: Highly organized, tons of opportunities for building skills, dedicated staff, very nice facilities, competitive pay, exciting and challenging work environment, very diverse client population and staff. Working here has had a huge impact on the person I am today and has helped push me to accomplish things that I didn’t think I could achieve.
cons: The work can be challenging, but it’s important to remember that the organization is a nonprofit and thus operates differently than a for-profit business, hospital or private medical practice.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Los Angeles, CA
pros: Co-workers are nice; but no time to even get to know them.
cons: Very biased and disrespectful management; never get things done on time; constant turn overs and over worked, pretty much like a slave, no freedom! Always new people coming and leaving. Upper management has no clue what they are doing! Felt like everything is always falling apart. Gifts brought by appreciative patients for Doctors and nurses are always taken away by administration put on raffle; cheap people. Good people can never stay long with this toxic company.

pros: This company truly invest in its staff, its patients and its future as a part of the community. Management does its best to create a fun, positive and fulfilling work experience. The staff truly cares about its work, values the team and knows how to bring enjoyment into the workplace.
cons: No significant cons that one wouldn't find in any workplace.

job_title: Medical Assistant in Los Angeles, CA
pros: You are able to learn a lot during your time at the company. Never a dull moment, very fast paced environment. If you express interest in growth,management will take a chance on you. Kheir will completely pay for your benefits.
cons: Have to pay $40 for parking a month.

job_title: Medical Assistant in Los Angeles, CA
pros: This is a great organization that helps patients get great care. The staff is professional and is always ready to give a helping hand. There is a great opportunity for growth.

job_title: Health Education and Information Outreach Specialist in Los Angeles, CA
pros:
can build lots of experience 
friendly environment 
get to know how clinic flows
cons: if you aren't a people person? don't do it

review_title: This place still gives me nightmares.
job_title: Administrative Staff in Los Angeles, CA
pros: People in the local community come hear as a last resort. Often they have no where else to go, so this place can provide value.
cons: Highly toxic work environment. No opportunity to advance.
